label: Privacy Policy
title: Privacy Policy
summary: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. It also explains how you can access and update your information.

paragraphs.heading: Introduction
paragraphs.section: Paisr Technologies values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy ('Policy') explains how we collect, use, store, and share your information when you use our platform, website, and services. It also describes your rights regarding your personal data and how to exercise them.

paragraphs.heading: Scope
paragraphs.section: This Policy applies to all users of our platform and services, including individuals, businesses, and organizations. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Policy.

paragraphs.heading: Information We Collect
paragraphs.section: We collect various types of information including but not limited to:

bullets.title: Usage Data:
points: Information about how you use our website, products, and services

paragraphs.heading: How We Use Your Information
paragraphs.section: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including but not limited to:

bullets.title: To provide and maintain our services:
To communicate with you:
points: Respond to inquiries and support requests

bullets.title: To comply with legal obligations:
points: Respond to legal requests and investigations

paragraphs.heading: Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data
paragraphs.section: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

bullets.title: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you:
Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests:
Where we need to comply with a legal obligation:
points: To prevent fraud and money laundering
To respond to legal requests and investigations

paragraphs.heading: Data Sharing and Disclosure
paragraphs.section: We may share your information with third parties in the following circumstances:
paragraphs.footer: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

bullets.title: Service Providers:
points: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our services, provide the service on our behalf, perform service-related services, or assist us in analyzing how our services are used.

bullets.title: Compliance with Laws:
points: We may disclose your personal data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g., a court or a government agency).

bullets.title: Business Transfers:
points: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal data may be transferred. We will provide notice before your personal data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.

paragraphs.heading: Data Retention
paragraphs.section: We will retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Policy. We will retain and use your personal data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

paragraphs.heading: Security of Your Information
paragraphs.section: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal data, including:
paragraphs.footer: However, please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

bullets.title: Encryption:
points: We encrypt your personal data before storing it to prevent unauthorized access.
We use encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online.

bullets.title: Access Controls:
points: We restrict access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors, and other third parties who have a business need to know.

bullets.title: Regular Security Assessments:
points: We regularly assess our security measures to ensure the protection of your personal data.

paragraphs.heading: Your Rights
paragraphs.section: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
paragraphs.footer: To exercise any of these rights, please contact: privacy@paisr.tech

bullets.title: Right to Access:
points: You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
We may charge you a small fee for this service.

bullets.title: Right to Rectification:
points: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate.
You also have the right to request that we complete information you believe is incomplete.

bullets.title: Right to Erasure:
points: You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

bullets.title: Right to Restrict Processing:
points: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

bullets.title: Right to Data Portability:
points: You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

paragraphs.heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
paragraphs.section: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience and collect data. Refer to our Cookie Policy for more details.

paragraphs.heading: Changes to the Policy
paragraphs.section: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Policy on our website. We encourage you to review this Policy periodically for any updates.

paragraphs.heading: Contact Us
paragraphs.section: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@paisr.tech.
paragraphs.footer: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
